code: import React from'react';import{Link,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import{Map,History,Compass,Download}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navigation=()=>{const location=useLocation();const navItems=[{path:'/',label:'Map',icon:Map},{path:'/history',label:'History',icon:History},{path:'/routes',label:'Routes',icon:Compass},{path:'/export',label:'Export',icon:Download}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"nav",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-title",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"\uD83E\uDDE0"}),"Alzense"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"nav-links",children:navItems.map(_ref=>{let{path,label,icon:Icon}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:path,className:"nav-link ".concat(location.pathname===path?'active':''),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Icon,{size:20,style:{marginRight:'0.5rem'}}),label]})},path);})})]})});};export default Navigation;
